game.name: Symphonia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 시적이고 평화로운 플랫폼 게임에서 광활한 음악의 세계를 깨우세요. 심포니아에서는 플랫폼 게임 실력으로 바이올린의 힘을 발휘해 오케스트라를 모으고 세계의 음악 기계를 되살려야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Awaken an expansive musical realm in this non-violent and poetic platformer. In Symphonia, you'll use the power of your violin coupled with your platforming skills to gather an orchestra to bring the musical machinery of the world back to life.

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]How in THE WORLD did this game get so little attention!?!?[/h1] I'm not going to say that [i]Symphonia[/i] is a masterpiece, but HOLY does it have...
I want to start this by saying that this is just my personal experience. It's entirely possible that my bias lends itself to my negative review and I...
